response.original_title: The Champions of Troy: Complete History of USC Trojan Football
response.overview: Relive the winning tradition of the USC Trojans, from the four championships of the Howard Jones era through the John McKay and John Robinson eras to the team's back-to-back national championship runs in 2004 and 2005. This video -- a must-see for Trojans fans -- is packed with interviews from the most memorable players and coaches in USC history and includes bonus features on the six Heisman winners and all USC Rose Bowl victories.
response.title: The Champions of Troy: Complete History of USC Trojan Football
